== "UsePortalPerm"</expression> </define> <sequence> <evaluateRule code="BRCode2" /> <evaluateRule code="BRCode9" /> </sequence> </if> <if> <define> <expression>CC.JGComboBox1.Value == variable.desc: 动态维度EP方法输出VSQL必须BASE64编码才能正常使用，如果不使用BASE64编码则不能正常运行 方法一：直接传入编码后的值 方法二：调用函数，先拼接再编码，如下写法： EncodeBASE64(ConcatStr("<Conditions> <sqlConStr type='string'> <","![CDATA[ 1 = 0 or userId ='",BR_VAR_PARENT.userId,"'","]","]","> </sqlConStr> </Conditions>"),"UTF-8")
